title: Generationer
overview: A mummified infant's body is discovered during a renovation in a Frederiksberg apartment. Martha, an 87-year-old resident, unexpectedly confesses to the crime, triggering a journey into family secrets long buried. Crime and mystery intertwines as the complex tale of a family across multiple generations is unfolded. Told through the lens of a crime plot infused with subtle mysterious elements, exploring themes of guilt, shame, and transformation.
